short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quotes On Love For You Everyday!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love Quotes is a browser extension where your new tab is replaced by a quote on love that seeks to motivate you each time you open a new tab. A search box powered by Bing.com enables you to browse the internet right from the extension page.

How to get started
Love Quotes is a new tab extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to romantic and powerful quotes on love each day along with a search bar that will be replaced by Bing.com search for your convenience. The extension is easy to use and user-friendly.

It does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permission

Features
A quote on love your New Tab
Ease of navigation
Custom search powered by Bing.com
Completely free to use

Permissions
It needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Love Quotes add-on with the features including the access to custom search. This add-on does NOT ask for your login or password.

By clicking "Install Now", I accept and agree to install the "Love Quotes" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.


Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Love Quotes", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Love Quotes?", click the Remove button.


Disclaimer:
The search engine on the new tab will change to Bing.com once downloaded.
